channel.title: Populus Ussuriensis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Populus Ussuriensis on funPlantGenes

item.title: Pu-miR172d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pu-miR172d Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Pu-miR172d regulates stomatal density and water-use efficiency via targeting PuGTL1 in poplar.

item.title: PuGTL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuGTL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Pu-miR172d regulates stomatal density and water-use efficiency via targeting PuGTL1 in poplar.

item.title: PuHox52
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuHox52 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuHox52 promotes coordinated uptake of nitrate, phosphate, and iron under nitrogen deficiency in Populus ussuriensis.
